entities.name: luna
entities.description: Luna is mentioned as saying that people write for the magazine because it's an honor and to see their names in print. ("I don’t think Daddy exactly pays  people to write for the maga-zine," said Luna dreamily.)

entities.name: rita
entities.description: Rita is mentioned as being offered a deal by Hermione and reacting negatively. (‘I’m supposed to do this for free?’ Rita looked as though the taste of Stinksap was strong in her mouth again as she rounded on Hermione.)

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as making a deal with Rita and threatening to expose her if she doesn't comply. (‘I’m supposed to do this for free?’ ... ‘Otherwise, as you very well know, I will inform the authorities that you are an unregistered Animagus.’)

entities.name: stinksap
entities.description: Stinksap is mentioned as something Rita dislikes. (Rita looked as though the taste of Stinksap was strong in her mouth again as she rounded on Hermione.)

entities.name: azkaban
entities.description: Azkaban is mentioned as a place where Rita might get a story from. (‘Of course, the Prophet might give you rather a lot for an insider’s acco unt of life in Azkaban.’)

entities.name: prophet
entities.description: The Prophet is mentioned as a source of information and potential payment. (‘Of course, the Prophet might give you rather a lot for an insider’s acco unt of life in Azkaban.’)

entities.name: daddy
entities.description: Daddy is mentioned as someone who doesn't pay people to write for the magazine. (‘I don’t think Daddy exactly pays  people to write for the maga-zine,’ said Luna dreamily.)

relationships.description: Hermione threatens Rita with exposure if she doesn't comply. (‘Otherwise, as you very well know, I will inform the authorities that you are an unregistered Animagus.’)
Hermione offers Rita a deal. (‘I’m supposed to do this for free?’ ... ‘Otherwise, as you very well know, I will inform the authorities that you are an unregistered Animagus.’)
Rita dislikes Stinksap. (Rita looked as though the taste of Stinksap was strong in her mouth again as she rounded on Hermione.)
